name: fire-memory
effect: Held: Changes Silvally to its Fire form.  Changes Multi-Attack's type to Fire.
short_effect: Held: Changes Silvally to its Fire form.  Changes Multi-Attack's type to Fire.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
A memory disc that contains Fire-type data.
It changes the type of the holder if held by
a certain species of Pokémon.
